root.name: Galaga 3
root.description: The major difference in this installation of Galaga was the ability for your ship to capture the enemy ships. The player is given the ability to use the "tractor beam" that was used to capture your ship in the first game. The player could potentially capture a large amount of enemy ships to fight along side their ship.Galaga 3 also has "time warp" areas, where instead of your ship moving forward, your ship moves backwards and the Galaga swarms are more frenzied as they attack your ship.TriviaThere isn't a game named Galaga 2 in existence. However, if one counts Galaxian as the original Galaga, then Galaga becomes the second game in the series followed by Galaga 3.
